headline: A U.S. Military Plane Crashes in a Taliban-Controlled Area of Afghanistan
abstract: After hours of confusion, the United States military said there was no indication that enemy fire had caused the aircraft to crash in Taliban territory.
lead_paragraph: KABUL, Afghanistan â€” An American military aircraft crashed in a Taliban-controlled area outside Kabul on Monday, the United States military command in Afghanistan said, following hours of confusion after officials had initially identified the plane as a passenger airliner.
